General.Name: Jantsa Jant Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Jantsa Jant Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells steel wheels for commercial, industrial, and agricultural machinery primarily in Turkey. The company offers agricultural and multi-purpose wheels for tractors, agricultural equipment, trailers, and forestry; industrial wheels for use in construction, material handling, earthmoving, and mining applications; and commercial wheels for trucks, buses, and trailers, as well as military wheels. The company supplies its products to OEM and aftermarket customers. It also exports its products to approximately 85 countries. The company was incorporated in 1977 and is headquartered in Aydin, Turkey.
General.Address: Umurlu Mahallesi Organize Sanayi Bölgesi, Aydin, Turkey, 09630
